    • Method Detail

      • size

        public abstract int size()
        Gets the number of currently allocated elements (dynamically changes when worksheet is modified).

        The cells are internally allocated in rows and not in columns. In other words, when you load CSV/XLSX or access some cells via worksheet.getCells() method new rows and cells can be allocated but the column count will stay the same. To find last used column in the worksheet, use ExcelWorksheet.getUsedCellRange method.
